trans-unit.source: A Decodable Reader is a book that carefully limits the letters and words used so that it fits what a new reader is ready to read. Typically a language may have 5 - 10 decodable stages through which learners progress.
trans-unit.target: Jun U'jb'il in el qniky' jun u'jb'il lu' nim in ok tnab'il tu'n tajb'en qe techtz'ib' ex qe' yol tu'ntzan jiqnx tz'el tniky' alkye kjawl tsch'in jun ak'aj ajsch'il. Noq alkyex jun twitz yol at tuj 5 a 10 kol ma' tuj in el qniky' tu'ntzan tlaj nchi el b'a'n qe' ajxnaq'tzanjtz.

trans-unit.source: Bloom helps you to define this sequence of stages that readers work through. Each book you create will be targeted at one of those stages, and Bloom helps you to make sure that your book is decodable (figure out-able) by learners at that stage.
trans-unit.target: Bloom in onin ti'j tu'n t-xi' lapeya ti'j qe' qe kol ma' tuj tujtzan lu' nchik' qe ajsch'il. Qe' jun u'jb'il nkub' tb'incha'na qajb'ela tuj jun kol ma' tuj lu', ex Bloom qonil tu'n tqe' tk'u'ja qa at tu'jb'ila te in el qniky' (ja'ku tz'el qniky') kyu'n ajxnaq'tzanjtz tuj atzankol ma' tuj.

trans-unit.source: You can also make a Bloom Pack of templates that others can use to quickly create books based on the levels and stages that have been prepared by a literacy specialist.
trans-unit.target: Ja'ka b'ant kub' tb'incha'na jun tnej te Bloom te ttenb'il b'inchil u'jb'il tu'n tajb'en kyu'n junxitl tu'ntzan b'a'nx tu'n kyb'ant u'jb'il te jun wiq kol ch'in tuj ex qe' kol ma' tuj, aqe tzan lu' ma' chi b'aj aq'net kyu'n el kyniky' ti'j xnaq'tzb'il kye tij xjal.

trans-unit.source: To learn about using Decodable Readers in Bloom, you can:
trans-unit.target: Tu'n t-xnaq'tzet tza'n tu'n kyajb'en u'jb'il in el qniky' tuj Bloom, b'a'n:

trans-unit.source: Go to the Help menu, choose 'Documentation', and look in the index under "Decodable Readers".
trans-unit.target: Txi'ya tuj k'ol te onb'il, sak'onktza 'Onb'il' ex jyonxa "U'jb'il in el qniky'" tuj txolb'ab'il tb'i nab'il.

trans-unit.source: Go to the Help menu and choose: "Building Reader Templates".
trans-unit.target: Txi'ya tuj k'ol te onb'il, sak'onqtza "B'inchama kytenb'il u'jb'il".
